recipe.title: Sazerac Cocktails
ingredients: 1/2 teaspoon Peychaud's bitters or angostura bitters
instructions: Swirl 1/2 teaspoon Herbsaint or Pernod in each of 4 Martini glasses to coat inside of glasses.
Fill cocktail shaker with ice; add bourbon, bitters, simple syrup, and lemon twist. Shake well; strain into glasses.
